Class DatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
app.DatabaseConnector
public class DatabaseConnector extends Object
Utility class for managing database connections to the remote TAMU PostgreSQL server.

This class handles setting and retrieving database credentials and provides a static method for obtaining a Connection object for executing SQL queries throughout the POS system.

Author:
Ryan, Sam, Brenden

    • setDbUrl

      public static void setDbUrl(String url)
      Sets the database URL for the PostgreSQL connection.
      Parameters:
      url - the JDBC URL string for the database

    • setDbUser

      public static void setDbUser(String user)
      Sets the username used for database authentication.
      Parameters:
      user - the username for the database account

    • setDbPassword

      public static void setDbPassword(String password)
      Sets the password used for database authentication.
      Parameters:
      password - the password for the database account

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection()
      Establishes and returns a connection to the database.

      Loads the PostgreSQL JDBC driver and attempts to connect using the stored URL, username, and password. If the connection fails, the method returns null and prints an error message.

      Returns:
      a Connection object if successful, or null if connection fails
